Welcome to Codeforces-Api

Here are some endpoints you can use to get data from Codeforces:-

  1. Getting the accepted solutions for each participant on a given group:

    2. https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/<groupId>/c/<contestId>/p/<page>
    Codeforces contest link example:
    https://codeforces.com/group/MWSDmqGsZm/contest/223339/standings/page/3
    Your api call:
    https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/MWSDmqGsZm/c/223339/p/3

  2. Getting the accepted solutions for each participant on a given group from a list:

    3. https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/<groupId>/c/<contestId>/p/<page>/l/<listId>
    Codeforces contest link example:
    https://codeforces.com/group/MWSDmqGsZm/contest/223339/standings/page/3?list=39542a7f25fda1875082a7bd25b56ccf
    Your api call:
    https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/MWSDmqGsZm/c/223339/p/3/l/39542a7f25fda1875082a7bd25b56ccf

  3. Under development...
